mapper.insert: insert into member (email, pw, name, phone, company_code, signup_at) values (#{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{company_code}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where email = #{email} and pw = #{pw}
select count(*) from member where email = #{email}
mapper.update: update member set pw = #{pw} where email = #{email}
